title: Type ID - Modern, clean, sans-serif
content:
Hey guys, could somebody ID the headline font used in the linked image, or anything that looks similar?

[http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/1858/joicologoup9.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013053150/http:/img258.imageshack.us/img258/1858/joicologoup9.gif "http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/1858/joicologoup9.gif")
